it.apice.sapere.api.node.agents
Interface SAPEREAgent

All Superinterfaces:
Subscriber
All Known Subinterfaces:
ReactionManager
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSAPEREAgentImpl, AbstractSystemAgent, BluetoothManagerAgent, GuestsHandlerAgent, NetworkManagerImpl, NotifierAgent, ReactionManagerImpl, SysAgentImpl, UserAgentImpl
public interface SAPEREAgent
extends Subscriber

This interface models a generic agent running on the SAPERE middleware.

Author:
Paolo Contessi
